sentences.sContent: Avocado salad is a favourite of mine.
sentences.sCn: 鳄梨色拉是我的最爱之一。

sentences.sContent: Product inspection is the responsibility of the employees themselves.
sentences.sCn: 检验产品是员工自己的责任。

trans.tranCn: 属于(人或物)；关于(人或物)
trans.tranOther: used to show who something or someone belongs to or has a connection with
